content.p: Antimicrobial research Antimicrobial activities of natural products, including plant/herbal extracts, metabolites, compounds and functional food. Current members: Anticancer research Discovery of tropical plant derivatives and metabolites as cytotoxic agents. Functional Food Research Discovery of natural product derivatives as functional food with special interest in medicinal mushrooms. Smooth muscle pharmacology research Discovery of natural product derivatives and metabolites as modulator of smooth muscle tone. Immune Modulation Research Discovery of natural product derivatives as immune modulation agents. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
